name: Retailigence Corp.
description: Developer of Online-to-Offline (O2O) local marketing and commerce platform. The company provides in-store product data and location services for facilitating a shopper's path-to-purchase in brick-and-mortar stores.
one_liner: Developer of Online-to-Offline (O2O) local marketing and commerce platform. The company provides in-store product data and location services for facilitating a shopper's path-to-purchase in brick-and-mortar stores.
